name: garage
description: Garage is a distributed storage backend designed for self-hosted deployments. It replicates data across nodes, supports S3-compatible APIs, and is built for durability and low-overhead cloud-style storage.

features.title: Distributed Storage
features.description: Replicate data across multiple nodes for high availability and fault tolerance

features.title: REST API
features.description: Use standard S3 APIs for seamless integration with existing tools and applications

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Lightweight design optimized for self-hosted deployments with minimal resource requirements

features.title: Data Replication
features.description: Automatically replicate objects across nodes to ensure durability and redundancy

features.title: Geo
features.description: Deploy storage nodes across multiple locations for geographic redundancy

features.title: Self
features.description: Build your own S3-compatible object storage without relying on commercial cloud providers

features.title: Resilient Architecture
features.description: Handle node failures gracefully with automatic failover and data recovery

features.title: Simple Deployment
features.description: Easy setup and configuration for small to medium-scale distributed storage clusters
